metadata.title: CVE-2022-38861 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
The MPlayer Project mplayer SVN-r38374-13.0.1 is vulnerable to memorycorruption via function free_mp_image() of libmpcodecs/mp_image.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-38861` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mencoder - 2:1.4+ds1-3ubuntu0.1
mplayer - 2:1.4+ds1-3ubuntu0.1
mplayer-gui - 2:1.4+ds1-3ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mplayer package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:1.4+ds1-3ubuntu0.1').
